title: What type of bin is this file?
content:
Can someone help me what type of BIN file is that and can i read what is inside ? Thanks
https://easyupload.io/673djh

answers_data.content:
The file's signature is: 
55 66 49 13 31 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00             UfI.1...........
Although it needs to be verified, it could indicate Universal Flashing Interface firmware format.
